pages.text: Humanoid beasts that roam the Labyrinth. These part-cow, part-human beasts each have a Golden Axe as their choice of weapon, tearing defenses down. Their charge attack happens quickly and swiftly, and in groups, they overwhelm any careful adventurer.
小心牛頭人的黃金牛頭人戰斧。他們可能很少見，但他們對武器的不同選擇是致命的選擇，要造成更多傷害。
